message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for you at $1,500,000. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to ensure you have the chance to acquire a valuable asset at an attractive discount. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to stay within my budget of $1,500,000.  Would you be willing to consider $1,350,000?  This price would allow me to move forward with the purchase while still staying within my financial constraints.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In order to accommodate your needs, I am willing to consider a price of $1,375,000 for the product. This offers a slight increase from my previous offer, providing a more balanced solution for both parties involved. I look forward to your consideration of this counteroffer.
